primaryRed.description: Deep, appetizing red evocative of ketchup and heat.

primaryYellow.description: Golden yellow, high energy, resembles american cheese.

darkCharcoal.usage: Footer Background, Primary Text, Strong Contrast areas
darkCharcoal.description: Softer than pure black, adds a modern industrial feel.

offWhite.description: Clean, fresh background to make food photos pop.

typography.styleGuide: Headings should be ExtraBold and sentence case. Body text should be clean with generous line height.

visualMotifs: Rounded corners on buttons and image frames

brandStory.mission: Serve elite-quality smash burgers that keep people coming back.
brandStory.about: Chuck's Cheeseburgers started in 2024 as a home kitchen experiment. What began with feeding friends before football camp quickly grew into a recognizable brand in Batavia. We focus on consistent flavor, clean operations, and a high-energy vibe.
brandStory.futureGoals: Expanding catering, adding merch, and preparing for a food trailer in 2026.

burgers.name: Classic Smash
burgers.description: Single smash patty, american cheese, pickles, grilled/raw onions, lettuce, tomato, and Chuck's Signature Sauce.

burgers.name: Double Smash
burgers.description: Two crispy-edged patties, double american, pickles, grilled onions, lettuce, tomato, and Signature Sauce.

burgers.name: Triple Smash
burgers.description: Three crispy-edged patties, triple american, pickles, grilled onions, lettuce, tomato, and Signature Sauce.

dietaryNotes: No gluten-free buns (burger bowls available upon request).

catering.description: We bring the full Chuck's experience to private events, corporate lunches, and parties. We cook fresh on-site and serve with speed.
catering.serviceArea: Generally within 20 miles of Batavia, IL (flexible for large events)

merchandise.details: Black tee with Chuck's Cheeseburgers logo

testimonials.quote: Chuck's Cheeseburgers has been a great addition to the Batavia Farmers' Market. People can smell your smashburgers from across the lot, and itâ€™s one of the things they look forward to each week. Your food is always delicious, your vibe is friendly and fun, and you bring an energy that makes the market feel even more like a community hangout.
testimonials.author: Kathy Kuchta
testimonials.title: Market Coordinator/Administrative Assistant

testimonials.quote: The smash burgers were so good that I never got one. Everyone told me how great they were, so we will be hiring Chuck's Cheeseburgers in the very near future.
testimonials.author: Dave Murray
testimonials.title: Business Agent, Ironworkers 63 Union

testimonials.quote: You make a better burger than my dad.
testimonials.author: Early Customer (Dom)

faq.question: Do you offer gluten-free options?
faq.answer: No gluten-free buns yet, but we offer no-bun burger bowls.

faq.question: Do you travel for catering?
faq.answer: Generally within 20 miles of Batavia, but flexible for larger events.

faq.question: Do you serve vegetarian options?
faq.answer: Not currently, we focus on smash burgers.

faq.question: How early should I book catering?
faq.answer: 2-4 weeks ahead is recommended, but last-minute requests are possible depending on schedule.
